articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: John Wise's Public Repoistory
articles.contents:
John Wise's Public Repository
          
          
          Home
          About
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              John Wise’s Public Repoistory
            
            
              
                
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Welcome!
            Welcome to my repository/website!
            My name is John Wise, and I spent nearly 19 years
            incarcerated in Florida. During my time inside, I dedicated
            myself to studying mathematics and data science with the
            aspiration of sharing my journey and experiences of being
            incarcerated.
            This repository serves as a platform where I can share my
            endeavors, including my insights on incarceration, as well
            as some of my creative writing. It is my sincere hope that
            my work will contribute to a greater understanding of the
            challenges faced by those who have been incarcerated and
            foster meaningful conversations.
            Thank you for visiting my repository and joining me on
            this journey.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              John Wise’s Public Repoistory

      Late Updated 2023-09-19 [John Wise]
      Site Built using the Distill package and R Markdown within R
